name: Classic Vanilla
description: Smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream, perfect for those who love the timeless classic.

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
description: Rich chocolate ice cream loaded with chunks of fudge brownie for a decadent treat.

name: Strawberry Swirl
description: Delicious strawberry ice cream swirled with ribbons of sweet strawberry sauce.

name: Mint Chocolate Chip
description: Refreshing mint ice cream with generous amounts of chocolate chips for a delightful crunch.

name: Cookies and Cream
description: Creamy vanilla ice cream loaded with chunks of chocolate sandwich cookies.

name: Rocky Road
description: Decadent chocolate ice cream packed with marshmallows and roasted almonds.

name: Peanut Butter Cup
description: Creamy peanut butter ice cream with swirls of peanut butter and chocolate cups.

name: Caramel Crunch
description: Toffee-flavored ice cream with caramel swirls and bits of crunchy toffee.

name: Tropical Paradise
description: A blend of exotic fruits in a creamy coconut ice cream for a taste of the tropics.

name: Double Espresso
description: Intense coffee-flavored ice cream made with a double shot of espresso for coffee lovers.
